extendedInfo.description: ScoreMobile FC is your ultimate home for Football! With full coverage of the 2012 Premier league and UEFA Champions League. ScoreMobile FC has complete coverage of over 100+ football leagues and competitions, including: English Premier League (EPL), UEFA Champions League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, FIFA World Cup, MLS soccer and much more.â¢ ScoreMobile FC is your dedicated world football app, providing complete football and soccer coverage to keep you up with every goal and match, including the 2012 Premier league.â¢ With ScoreMobile FC you'll get the latest football: live scores, stats, betting odds, fixtures, news, video, league tables and much more!â¢ There are also FREE push alerts to alert you when goals are scored, red cards are issued as well as half time and final scores - convenient for when you can't be in front of a TV and want to know the latest news about your favourite teams.These are just some of the biggest competitions you will get:- 2014 FIFA World Cup Qualifying- UEFA Champions League- English Premier League (EPL)- La Liga- Serie A- Bundesligaâ¢ Install the ScoreMobile FC Football Score Ticker Widget to get all of your football and soccer scores even more conveniently!â¢ Tables:  quickly view wins, points or goal differential by league or group at a glance â¢ Fixtures:  View match previews, team records, live betting odds, player news or injuries and last five matches for every match  â¢ Choose the teams you want to follow and add them to the "Faves" area to view all their scores on one screenâ¢ View "Top Matches" to get all of the most popular match scores in one convenient areaâ¢ All match start times are customized for your areaâ¢ Sync any match to your calendar for convenienceFollow any of your favorite teams including the Premiership: Manchester City, Manchester United, Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool, AC Milan, Juventus, Inter Milan, FC Barcelona, Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Ajax, Boca Juniors, River Plate, Flamengo, Santos, and more.Follow all the top leagues from around the world including- UEFA Champions League - English Premier League (EPL) Pemiership- La Liga- Serie A- Bundesliga- Primeira Liga- Eredivisie- Primera Division- Brasileirao Serie A- Ligue 1- Super League- FIFA (Including 2014 World Cup qualifying)- UEFA- CONMEBOL- CONCACAF- AFC-MLS Soccer- And more!Always know your football or soccer scores when you're at home or mobile with ScoreMobile FC.--For optimal performance, ScoreMobile requires the users to accept the following permissions:â¢ Full Internet Access: Allows us to get you the live sports data through your wireless networkâ¢ Read Sensitive Log Data: If you have a bug, you can choose to send us the log files.â¢ Read Calendar Events: Allows you to add a game to your device calendarâ¢ Read Phone State and Identity: The Device ID is used by our servers to send Push Alerts to your device.â¢ Modify/Delete SD Card Contents: Gives you the option to save the app to your SD card.â¢ Prevent Phone From Sleeping: This keeps your widget up to date.â¢ Hardware Controls: Lets your phone vibrate when you receive an alertâ¢ Send Sticky Broadcast and Automatically Start at Boot: These are both used to send game Push Alerts

reviews.title: Still no preview/recap.
reviews.comment: Would easily be a five star app, but needs to being back the preview/recap tab for La Liga and other leagues. Only does it for the EPL and that\'s not fair to other major leagues.
reviews.author: Josue Vasquez

reviews.title: Only one issue
reviews.comment: I would give it 5 stars but every time I scroll down it automatically sends me back to the previous page. Example, if I\'m reading a story it sends me back to all the stories.  Other than that it\'s a great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent way to keep up!
reviews.comment: This app is quite excellent. It\'s the best app I\'ve found for lovers of lower league football teams in North America. Would have got five stars if there were pre and post match reports. Otherwise, not bad at all.
reviews.author: christopher winter

reviews.title: Nice but slow
reviews.comment: The best app if its smooth. The program doesn\'t respong smoothly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really glitchy!
reviews.comment: This app seems to lag a lot. I can barely scroll down a page without it skipping. On multiplt occasions I have tapped on a game and it leads me to some game I don\'t care about.
reviews.author: Oles Bober

reviews.title: Lacking match schedule
reviews.comment: Since a long time now its not giving proper match schedule ! No replays of FA and many premier league matches ! You really need to sort that out !
reviews.author: Shaukat Dar

reviews.title: Refresh??
reviews.comment: Very good app, but the widget doesen`t refresh. Only fix that and it`s a 5-star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice overall
reviews.comment: A nice app, I would love to see the Venezuela League here as well as some other apps have it but dont work well as this one does.
reviews.author: Daniel Basilio Garcia Plasencia

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: There are other tournaments going on and there are no updates. Really poor work.
reviews.author: Kerron Antoine

reviews.title: Best Live Soccer App
reviews.comment: Undoubtedly it is the best soccer app on the play store.
reviews.author: Julian Baffoe

reviews.title: Needs Fixing
reviews.comment: Widget needs to be fixed its always telling me there are no games for the epl and serie A even when there are games. Other then that not a bad app. With a widget fix it gets 5 stars from me  : )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I really like this, accurately and quickly notifies you of goals etc and updates its league tables faster than anyone else. Love the widget too, only downside are the abbreviations on it. BOL V SWA etc. Otherwise, neck and neck with Livescore and Livescore Widget for brilliance!
reviews.author: Kevin Roper

reviews.title: Needs holo redesign and bug fixes for 4.2
reviews.comment: There are lots of useful information and stats and those alone make it one of the best football apps on the market. However, there are bugs. Notifications work about half of the time. When I open game details and scroll quickly - the game screen closes. The app needs an update for 4.2.x, a holo redesign, and optimization to make it quicker. The widget, although useful, needs a complete redesign.
reviews.author: Sladjan Tasic

reviews.title: Solid content. Has bugs.
reviews.comment: When I scroll down it goes to previous page. Seems like a a lot of people are complaining about this hopefully the dev fixes this soon and id give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: brandon deyalsingh

reviews.title: Remember
reviews.comment: I really want to give this 5 stars, but it does not store my team subscriptions.  I\'ve tried multiple times.  It\'s the main reason I use this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: Best football app around and free alerts is the icing.   Only 2 small improvements would be a more up to the minute feed/blog for matches much like in the sky football app instead of only major moments.   Second and probably most important a good news feed for whatever league you are viewing so you could just have absolutely everything in 1 app without having to switch
reviews.author: Chris Thompson

reviews.title: really cool, but...
reviews.comment: I\'m really digging the automatic event adding function, but the time stated is never done so with the time zone. so I cannot tell is the games listed are my time, 3 hours ahead, or 2 behind. frustrating!   but super cool and useful app, otherwise!
reviews.author: Myra Jane

reviews.title: Issue Seems To Have Been Solved
Horrible
reviews.comment: When i had a blackberry this app worked flawless.now that i have an android this app is horrible.....its slow to load..i dont get updates until the game is over.....when i check to see what games are on the next day i scroll down and then it  switches to todays game.very annoying!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt work anymore
reviews.comment: Was good until last week,when suddenly there are no fixtures on sundays and no live score updates. .fix it soon
reviews.author: Prashant Kariman
